#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string>

using namespace std ;

int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,m,n,t,length,cT,cD ;
	cin >> t ;
	string s ;
	bool flag ;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> s ;
		length = s.length() ;
		cT = 0 ;
		cD = 0 ;
		for(i=0 ; i<s.length() ;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='T')
			{
				cT += 1 ;
			}else
			{
				cD += 1 ;
			}
		}
		if(cT == cD)
		{
			int d,c;
			c = -1 ;
			d = -1 ;
			flag = true ;
			for(i=1 ; i<=cT ; i++)
			{
				j = c + 1 ;
				while(j<=length)
				{	
					if(s[j]=='T')
					{
						c = j ;
						break ;
					}
					j++ ;
				}
				j = d + 1 ;
				while(j <= length)
				{
					if(s[j]=='D')
					{
						d = j ;
						break ;
					}
					j++ ;
				}
				if(c > d)
				{
					cout << "NO" << endl ;
					flag = false ;
					break ;
				}
			}
			if(flag)
				cout << "YES" << endl ;
		}else
		{
			cout << "NO" << endl ;
		}
	}
	
	return 0 ;
}
